entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
